content:
I've just been implementing $convert and run into an issue with Parameters Resources -- they don't get passed through to my input parameter.

I suspect that the request handler infrastructure is treating them specially. Is there any way to disable this for a specific operation?
In 4.0.0 we've just added an attribute to the @Operation annotation called manualRequest that disables all processing of the request by HAPI FHIR- That might be useful in this case.
Thanks! Will have to look at upgrading to 4.0.0 soon as it arrives.
